Descriptions: <color=#FFD900><size=130%>Archer Tower:</size></color>\n  Shoots at a high speed. Allowing for rapid attacks
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Archer Tower:</size></color>\n  The arrow applies a damage-over-time effect. Slowly reducing the enemy's health
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Mage tower:</size></color>\n  The Magic Ball hits the target and continues to deal damage over time.
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Mage tower:</size></color>\n  The Magic Ball damages the enemy over time and also slows their movement
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Cannon Tower:</size></color>\n  Bombs explode on impact. Dealing damage to all enemies in the area.
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Cannon Tower:</size></color>\n  Increases the damage attack. Making it more effective against enemies.
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Barrack:</size></color>\n   Summons three swordsmen to fight against incoming enemies.
<color=#FFD900><size=130%>Barrack:</size></color>\n   Summons three knights who heal themselves and allies. But only when they are not engaged in combat.
